Experience & Skills

HCLTech – Data Analytics Intern

Noida, India | Jan – Jun 2024

  • Analyzed Bing search data to optimize algorithms and boost engagement by 20%.
  • Built robust data pipelines for 100GB+ datasets, reducing ETL time by 40%.
  • Developed SQL queries to optimize query time and built Power BI dashboards to enhance reporting efficiency by 30%.

Siemens Logistics – Operations Consulting Intern

Gurugram, India | May – Jul 2023

  • Evaluated baggage system throughput and applied insights to automation strategies.
  • Integrated microservices into bag tracking, improving scalability by 14% and reducing error rates by 15%.

Skills

Tools & Tech: SQL, Python, R, Tableau, Power BI, Excel, Jupyter, Databricks, AWS, Azure, Spark, HPC

Analytics: Market Research, Survey Design, Regression, Clustering, Forecasting, A/B Testing, Financial Reporting

Certifications: AWS Cloud Security Foundations, Oracle DB Foundations, IBM Data Analysis with Python
